Class EventDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.server.master.utils.JDOSupport<Event>
      • org.apache.taverna.server.master.notification.atom.EventDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageDispatcher

    public class EventDAO
extends JDOSupport<Event>
implements MessageDispatcher
    The database interface that supports the event feed.

    Donal Fellows

        targetParameter - A description of where it is to go.
